original_title: No Fighting in the War Room Or: 'Dr Strangelove' and the Nuclear Threat
overview: A documentary exploring the historical concept of the narrative of Stanley Kubrick's 1964 film "Dr. Strangelove Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love The Bomb." This short documentary compares the film with the actual events concerning the Cold War and the Cuban Missle Crisis.
title: No Fighting in the War Room Or: 'Dr Strangelove' and the Nuclear Threat
